name: Sense of Speed - (A Complete Game)
description:
Click the left mouse button to switch gravity and dodge obstacles.

This is a game that I started before I even began studying game design. I choose a pretty simple concept to try and finish it quickly (that didn't happen). I actually built the game once, realized my original design prevented a feature I wanted to include, and then built the game from the ground up again. After hitting another roadblock, I abandoned the project until recently.
